entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Perfect Tempo
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

-- From the makers of the award-winning Just Press Record! -- Calling all music, dance and fitness enthusiasts‚Ä¶ and absolutely anyone who wants to change the tempo of their favourite songs without affecting pitch or fidelity! Perfect Tempo is the only app you‚Äôll ever need to speed up or slow down over 100 million songs on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app. Create unlimited playlists and, if you have an Apple Watch, control playback from your wrist for the ultimate convenience! Perfect!! PICK ANY SONG ‚Ä¢ Change the tempo of any song on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app without affecting pitch or fidelity ‚Ä¢ Access the entire Apple Music catalog of over 100 million songs! ‚Ä¢ Play tracks from Cloud Drive, Dropbox and other cloud services ‚Ä¢ Quick access to your recently played songs ADJUST THE TEMPO ‚Ä¢ A simple slider for adjusting tempo ‚Ä¢ Select any tempo from -50% to +100%, in 1% increments ‚Ä¢ Easily revert to the original tempo with just one tap ‚Ä¢ App will remember your chosen tempo until you want to adjust it again CREATE SETLISTS ‚Ä¢ Create unlimited Setlists ‚Ä¢ Name your Setlists to find them easily later ‚Ä¢ Continuous play from one song to the next ‚Ä¢ Set and remember different tempos for different songs ‚Ä¢ Combine songs from Apple Music, your Music app and Files app all in the same Setlist ‚Ä¢ Create Setlists from existing albums and playlists in your Music app or on Apple Music REPEAT JUST ONE SECTION ‚Ä¢ Select and change the tempo of just one section of a song and then loop it to make practise easy ‚Ä¢ Add sections of a song to a Setlist multiple times and then play them back at different tempos APPLE WATCH ‚Ä¢ Easily control playback, tempo and volume from your wrist AIRPLAY ‚Ä¢ AirPlay support for output to wireless speakers or Apple TV AND MORE ‚Ä¢ Support for Dark Mode ‚Ä¢ Change the key (transpose up or down) of locally stored DRM-free songs imported into the app or from your Music app. (Missing the pitch controls from the last version? Re-enable them in the Settings app > Perfect Tempo. Then swipe left on the album artwork when playing a song) IMPORTANT! * Songs from streaming services other than Apple Music are not supported *

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Mayor Card: City Management
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,29¬†‚Ç¨ [0,29¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,29¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES! Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history! Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you‚Äôre out of office‚Äîmaintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices‚Äîevery decision is yours! ‚Ä¢ Swipe & Decide ‚Äì Instant control, deep consequence. ‚Ä¢ Triple Balance System ‚Äì People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green. ‚Ä¢ Chain Cards ‚Äì Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future. ‚Ä¢ Adventure Cards ‚Äì Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends. ‚Ä¢ Character Stories ‚Äì Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief‚Ä¶ each NPC steers you to a different ending. ‚Ä¢ Endless Replayability ‚Äì Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new. LAUNCH DISCOUNT ‚Äî NOW LIVE! Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Groundwire: VoIP SIP Softphone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 5,99¬†‚Ç¨ [5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 9,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • ZRTP For Outgoing CallsÔºö29,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Acrobits Groundwire: Elevate Your Communication Acrobits, a leader in UCaaS and communication solutions for over 20 years, proudly introduces the Acrobits Groundwire softphone. This top-tier SIP softphone client offers unmatched voice and video call clarity. A softphone designed for both personal and professional use, it seamlessly integrates quality communication with an intuitive interface. IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ Groundwire is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. You must have service with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports use on a standard SIP client to use it. Choosing the Best Softphone App Experience robust communication with a leading SIP softphone application. Preconfigured for major VoIP providers, this softphone app guarantees high-quality, secure, and intuitive calling. Perfect for maintaining connections with friends, family, and colleagues, maximizing all aspects of your VoIP experience. Key Features of the SIP Softphone - Exceptional Audio Quality: Enjoy crystal clear audio with support for multiple formats including Opus and G.729. - HD Video Calls: Conduct up to 720p HD video calls, supported by H.264 and VP8. - Robust Security: Our SIP softphone app ensures private conversations with military-grade encryption. - Battery Efficiency: Thanks to our efficient push notifications, you can stay connected with minimal battery drain. - Seamless Call Transition: Our VoIP dialer smoothly switches between WiFi and data plans during calls. - Softphone Customization: Tailor your SIP settings, UI, and ringtones. - 5G and Multi-Device Support: Ready for the future, compatible with most mobile operating systems. Other features included on this robust app include: instant messaging, attended and unattended transfers, group calls, voicemail, and extensive customization for each SIP account. More Than Just a VoIP Softphone Dialer Groundwire softphone offers more than the standard VoIP dialer experience. It‚Äôs a comprehensive tool for crystal clear Wi-Fi calling, equipped with robust business VoIP dialer features. It offers a secure and reliable softphone choice with no hidden fees and a one-time cost. Leverage SIP technology for improved call quality. Make this softphone your first choice for dependable, and easy SIP communication. Download a feature-rich and modern SIP softphone now and be part of a community enjoying the best in voice and SIP calling. Transform your daily communication with our exceptional VoIP softphone app.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Acrobits Softphone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö7,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 3,99¬†‚Ç¨ [3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 7,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • ZRTP For Outgoing CallsÔºö29,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Make voice and video calls, send messages, and stay connected with Acrobits Softphone App ‚Äî a powerful and feature-rich SIP softphone designed for all your calling needs. IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ Acrobits Softphone is a SIP Client, not a VoIP service. To use it, you need an account with a VoIP provider or PBX that supports standard SIP clients. Note: this app does not support call transfer or conference calling. Take your VoIP calling experience to the next level with Acrobits Softphone with out-of-the-box support for many of the most popular providers and Bluetooth devices on the market. Acrobits Softphone brings all the popular features you expect from a SIP app, including support for 5G, voice and video calling, push notifications, call handover between WiFi and data, multi-device compatibility, lifetime access to support and updates, and more. Experience crystal clear calling with support for popular audio standards, including Opus, G.722, G.729, G.711, iLBC, and GSM. Need to make video calls? Acrobits Softphone supports up to 720p HD and supports both H.265 and VP8. You can even create your own look and feel. Acrobits Softphone is fully customizable, allowing you to configure your own SIP call settings, UI, ringtones, and more. Acrobits Softphone makes it easy for you to communicate with friends and family on any device. This SIP calling app is compatible with virtually all iPhones and iPads. Don‚Äôt worry about hidden fees. You can try Acrobits Softphone today for a one-time fee that comes with lifetime support and updates.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Raiders Map
entry.content:

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Arc drop list, guides and quest-line guides. NOT affiliated with Embark. Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULhttp://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeulaA

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Application Description

MagicKit AI ‚Äì Kit de Ferramentas Tudo-em-Um para o Seu Dispositivo O MagicKit AI √© um aplicativo utilit√°rio completo, projetado para ajud√°-lo a monitorar seu dispositivo, otimizar o desempenho e acessar ferramentas do dia a dia em uma interface pr√°tica. Desenvolvido especialmente para iOS, o MagicKit AI re√∫ne funcionalidades essenciais enquanto protege sua privacidade e economiza bateria. Ferramentas do Dispositivo e do Sistema ‚Ä¢ Status da Bateria: Veja o n√≠vel de carga e o estado atual da bateria ‚Ä¢ Uso de Armazenamento: Analise o espa√ßo usado e dispon√≠vel ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes do Dispositivo: Verifique detalhes do hardware e do sistema ‚Ä¢ Tempo de Atividade: Monitore h√° quanto tempo o dispositivo est√° ligado ‚Ä¢ Dicas de Bateria: Receba conselhos √∫teis para melhorar o uso da bateria ‚Ä¢ Limpeza de Fotos: Detecte e remova fotos duplicadas ou semelhantes ‚Ä¢ Limpeza de Contatos: Organize contatos removendo duplicatas e entradas incompletas ‚Ä¢ Gerenciador de RAM: Monitore o uso da mem√≥ria e otimize o desempenho ‚Ä¢ Teste de Benchmark: Avalie o desempenho de CPU, GPU, mem√≥ria e rede Ferramentas de Rede ‚Ä¢ Teste de Velocidade: Me√ßa a velocidade da conex√£o com a internet ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes do Wi-Fi: Veja nome da rede, IP e status da conex√£o ‚Ä¢ Consulta de IP: Verifique a geolocaliza√ß√£o de endere√ßos IP p√∫blicos ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes de Localiza√ß√£o: Acompanhe GPS, velocidade, dire√ß√£o e altitude Seguran√ßa e Privacidade ‚Ä¢ Gerador de Senhas: Crie senhas fortes e seguras com op√ß√µes personaliz√°veis ‚Ä¢ Gerador de Frases de Acesso: Crie frases memor√°veis e seguras ‚Ä¢ Gerador de UUID: Crie identificadores √∫nicos em v√°rios formatos ‚Ä¢ Gerador de PIN Seguro: Gere c√≥digos PIN seguros com v√°rias op√ß√µes ‚Ä¢ E-mail Tempor√°rio: Crie e-mails descart√°veis para proteger sua privacidade Ferramentas Utilit√°rias ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Unidades: Converta entre diferentes unidades de medida ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Moeda e Cripto: Veja taxas de c√¢mbio em tempo real para moedas e criptomoedas ‚Ä¢ Calculadora de Datas: Calcule diferen√ßas entre datas com suporte para dias √∫teis ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Fuso Hor√°rio: Converta hor√°rios com atualiza√ß√µes ao vivo e suporte a hor√°rio de ver√£o ‚Ä¢ Contagem Regressiva e Lembretes: Crie contagens regressivas personalizadas com lembretes e eventos recorrentes ‚Ä¢ Contador M√°gico: Acompanhe m√∫ltiplos contadores com estat√≠sticas e sequ√™ncias ‚Ä¢ Leitor de QR Code: Escaneie c√≥digos QR instantaneamente ‚Ä¢ Scanner de Documentos e Cart√µes: Capture e salve digitaliza√ß√µes com reconhecimento de texto via IA ‚Ä¢ B√∫ssola e N√≠vel: Me√ßa dire√ß√£o e n√≠vel usando os sensores do dispositivo ‚Ä¢ Travar Orienta√ß√£o: Trave a orienta√ß√£o da tela ao usar o app ‚Ä¢ Medidor de √Åudio: Me√ßa n√≠veis de som ao redor com o microfone ‚Ä¢ Gerenciador de √Årea de Transfer√™ncia: Acesse e gerencie textos copiados durante a sess√£o ‚Ä¢ Lanterna e Brilho: Ative a lanterna e ajuste o brilho da tela ‚Ä¢ Bloco de Notas: Crie, organize e gerencie notas com categorias e backup no iCloud ‚Ä¢ Gerador Universal: Gere dados aleat√≥rios como texto, n√∫meros, datas e mais Destaques ‚Ä¢ entry.title: Doodle Baseball Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 2,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you‚Äôre a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter‚Äôs box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

Application Screenshot

iPad

Pesquise por nome, ingrediente e muito mais. ‚Ä¢ Timers - Os tempos de preparo s√£o detectados automaticamente nas suas instru√ß√µes. Basta tocar em uma delas para iniciar um timer. ‚Ä¢ Importe - Importe a partir de aplicativos existentes como MacGourmet, YummySoup!, MasterCook e Living Cookbook. ‚Ä¢ Exporte - Exporte seus planos de refei√ß√µes para o Calend√°rio e suas listas de compras para os Lembretes. ‚Ä¢ Compartilhe - Compartilhe receitas por AirDrop ou e-mail. ‚Ä¢ Imprima - Imprima receitas, listas de compras, menus e planos de refei√ß√µes. As receitas s√£o compat√≠veis com diversos formatos de impress√£o, incluindo fichas. ‚Ä¢ Extens√µes - Salve receitas diretamente no Safari e veja as refei√ß√µes programadas do dia. ‚Ä¢ Bookmarklet - Baixe receitas em qualquer navegador diretamente para a sua conta de Sincroniza√ß√£o em Nuvem do Paprika. ‚Ä¢ Acesso Offline - Todos os seus dados s√£o armazenados localmente. N√£o √© necess√°rio conex√£o de internet para ver suas receitas. Novidades da vers√£o 3.0 ‚Ä¢ Suporte a iPhone X e iOS 11. ‚Ä¢ O aplicativo para iOS agora √© universal. ‚Ä¢ Suporte a multitarefa no iPad. ‚Ä¢ Adicione diversas fotos em tamanho real para cada receita. Inclua fotos nas suas instru√ß√µes. ‚Ä¢ Insira links para outras receitas ou sites nos seus ingredientes ou instru√ß√µes. ‚Ä¢ Formate receitas usando negrito e it√°lico. ‚Ä¢ Converta medidas de ingredientes entre padr√£o e m√©trico. ‚Ä¢ Pesquise receitas em diversas categorias. ‚Ä¢ Adicione corredores personalizados na sua lista de compras e reorganize na ordem desejada. ‚Ä¢ Crie m√∫ltiplas listas de compras. ‚Ä¢ Adicione ingredientes personalizados na despensa. Monitore quantidades, datas de compra e datas de validade. ‚Ä¢ Mova itens entre a despensa e a lista de compras e vice-versa. ‚Ä¢ Adicione tipos de refei√ß√µes personalizados no planejador de refei√ß√µes. ‚Ä¢ Crie menus reutiliz√°veis que englobem diversos dias.
